C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, UseTab: Never, AlignAfterOpenBracket: Align, AlignOperands: Align, AlignConsecutiveAssignments: Consecutive, AlignConsecutiveDeclarations: Consecutive, SpaceBeforeAssignmentOperators: true, SpaceAfterCStyleCast: true, SpaceBeforeParens: Never, SpaceInEmptyParentheses: false, SpacesInAngles: Never, SpacesInContainerLiterals: false, PointerAlignment: Left, ColumnLimit: 100, BreakBeforeBraces: Allman, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: false }
